server.description: DNS server to forward requests to
server.title: DNS Server

interface.description: List of interfaces to listen on. If unspecified listens on loopback

notinterface.description: List of interfaces should not listen on

domainneeded.description: Tells dnsmasq never to forward queries for plain names, without dots or domain parts, to upstream nameservers

boguspriv.description: Reject reverse lookups to private IP ranges

localise_queries.description: Choose IP address to match the incoming interface

rebind_protection.description: Enables DNS rebind attack protection by discarding upstream RFC1918 responses

rebind_localhost.description: Allows upstream 127.0.0.0/8 responses, required for DNS based blacklist services, only takes effect if rebind protection is enabled

nonegcache.description: Disable caching of negative “no such domain” responses

readethers.description: Read static lease entries from DHCP

localservice.description: Accept DNS queries only from hosts whose address is on a local subnet, ie a subnet for which an interface exists on the server
